column4: Microsoft brings document scanner app to iPhones  Android
column5: SEATTLE  April 2 Microsoft Corp said on Thursday it is bringing one of its most popular apps  which lets people take photos of a document and turn it into a editable file  to Apple Inc's iPhone and Google Inc's  Android.

column4: BRIEF-Ingenico Group and Intel to bring payments to the Internet of Things
column5: * Ingenico Group and Intel Corp to bring payments to the Internet of Things

column4: Check Point to buy Israel's Lacoon Mobile Security
column5: TEL AVIV Internet and network security provider Check Point Software Technologies will buy Israel-based Lacoon Mobile Security for tens of millions of dollars  it said on Thursday.
